justification: "...signatures of neural evidence accumulation can be observed using human electroencephalography (EEG), in the form of a centroparietal positivity (CPP) that builds up during deliberation and peaks when the overt response is made."

measured_by: visual looming detection task with optically expanding car stimulus
justification: "Participants were instructed to press a key as soon as they saw the car 'coming closer' (i.e., growing on the screen)."  This behavioral task operationalises collision-threat detection.

measured_by: variable-gain accumulator model (model AV) fitted to response-time distributions
justification: "This extended model (model AV) produced distributions that more closely matched those of the human detection responses," indicating that the construct is quantified through parameters of the fitted accumulator model.
